title: Java Software Engineer
info: BlindData is calling all talented software engineers to test yourself against the best engineers from Google and MIT.
description: -Collaborate with our testing problem contributors to author, edit and deploy coding challenges on our platform. -Constantly enhance platform performance and help scale our system as we grow. -Create experiences for app and web environments. -Partner with Lead Developer and CTO on various projects. -Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables. -Maintain and iterate on company website and overall user experience for candidates and partners. -Work on a small, agile and growing team to help us build out the business and expand our user base.
